speciePage.futTrend_CM: What is the expected trend in production over the next 10 years? Please mark appropriate box.

ftypePage.culturesSystemper_P: Quantify, in percentage, the contribution of each system to national aquaculture production.

ftypePage.EstValVar_P: Estimated total value of production (in USD)
ftypePage.OrigVar_P: What is the origin of this farmed type?

ftypePage.VarDomestication_P: How many generations has it been domesticated?
ftypePage.VarBreeding_P: What selective breeding techniques were used:

ftypePage.Varherch_P: Does it have heritable distinguishing characteristics?
